data.name: Nonozle Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This album is the soundtrack for the game Nonozle.

Recorded using a Korg Volca FM, the soundtrack aims for a relatively relaxing, chill experience, befitting its state as background music for a puzzle game. It features rounded-off electronic FM synthesis sounds that are pleasing to the ear, filled out with reverb and delay. Lots and lots of delay.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: FM synthesis-based soundtrack to the puzzle game Nonozle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 84 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 401 MB available space
